brooklyn.cli
[Java] Class Main

java.lang.Object
  brooklyn.cli.Main

public class Main

This class is the primary CLI for brooklyn. Run with the `help` argument for help.

This class is designed for subclassing, with subclasses typically:

  • providing their own static main(String...) (of course) which need simply invoke execCli(String[]) with the arguments
  • returning their CLI name (e.g. "start.sh") in an overridden cliScriptName()
  • providing an overridden LaunchCommand via cliLaunchCommand() if desired
  • providing any other CLI customisations by overriding cliBuilder() (typically calling the parent and then customizing the builder)
  • populating a custom catalog using LaunchCommand#populateCatalog(BrooklynCatalog)#populateCatalog(BrooklynCatalog)

    Nested Class Summary
    static class Main.BrooklynCommand

    abstract superclass for commands defining global options, but not arguments, as that prevents Help from being injectable in the HelpCommand subclass
    static class Main.BrooklynCommandCollectingArgs

    common superclass for commands, defining global options (in our super) and extracting the arguments
    static class Main.HelpCommand

    static class Main.InfoCommand

    static class Main.LaunchCommand
